Hey, I'm Justin

I design and develop user experiences for web and mobile products. Find me on Twitter @theJayBeeWhy.

Email

I'm the principal UX designer and information architect (and occasional front-end developer) at Media Temple, a webhosting and support provider. I design and guide the creation of user experiences that make Media Temple's products easy to use and valuable to customers. On the side, I design and develop Two Words For, an online arts and literary magazine (and a constantly-changing work in progress). For my most recent work, see my profiles at dribbble and CodePen. I also write for the Media Temple blog.

About

Justin Barr Young designs and develops user experiences for web and mobile products.

He's the principal UX designer and information architect (and occasional front-end developer) at Media Temple, a webhosting and support provider. He designs and guides the creation of user experiences that make Media Temple's products easy and valuable for users. On the side, he designs and develops Two Words For, an online arts and literary magazine (and a constantly-changing work in progress).
